nodes.text: Bentora Space was a region of the galaxy. It shared its name with the Bentora system, which was located in the Outer Rim Territories' Samix sector. Bentora Space was home to a group known as the Chyakk clan. On the date 36:1:16, a news report by Cynabar's InfoNet mentioned that the smuggler Platt Okeefe wished to relay a message to the Wookiee Chyakk clan on the Hook Nebula planet Lan Barell. To disambiguate, the news report distinguished between the Chyakk clan of Lan Barell and that of Bentora Space.
Bentora Space was introduced by Paul Sudlow in the "Galaxywide NewsNets" feature of West End Games' Star Wars Adventure Journal 5, which was published in February 1995.
